page.title: 16WORK IN PETERSFIELD 2
page.content:
ESTEE LAUDER COSMETICS
My brother Graham is a fork-lift truck driver at Estee Lauder Cosmetics factory. Estee Lauder get the things they need from Whitmans Laboratories, which is just down the road. A lot of other things come from Belgium and Switzerland. The most common perfumes are White Linen, Youth Dew, Private Collection, Cinnaba, JHL and Aramis for men. The jobs are office work, packing, warehousing, computers, fork- lift truck driving and testing. The cosmetics they make are soap, talc, perfume, deororant and lots more. Estee Lauder is very popular for its perfume.
